messages.subject: re: Unschooling and Postnatal Depression
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you everyone for all of your suggestions, you are right, i do need to seek help on this, I haven t yet because I ve always in the past been offered drugs
messages.messageBody:
Thank you everyone for all of your suggestions, you are right, i do need to seek help on this, I haven't yet because I've always in the past been offered drugs or counselling, neither of which has helped (unless you count the numbness that comes from drugs as help), but I do need to and hopefully if I go armed with a list of alternatives that might help rather than just saying how I'm feeling and what I'm going through that might work.  I have been doing my best to keep up my fluid levels and eat properly, but possibly a supplement would help as well, anyway, what I'm trying to say in my wittering roundabout way is thank you for so many suggestions and reminders of what I can and should do to help me and my family. 

Morag




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
